Pack ID is invalid
   provided component: l&t
   invalid characters found:
      - '&'
Texture ID is invalid
   provided component: aha      ùwú
   invalid characters found:
      - ' '
      - 'ù'
      - 'ú'
Option ID is invalid
   provided component: ra andom
   invalid characters found:
      - ' '
ID components are only allowed to contain loweralpha, numeric, and dash characters
